summary:
The World Economic Forum is an international group that brings together leaders from business, politics, and society to solve global problems. Founded in 1971 by Klaus Schwab, it's like a big think tank and lobbying group based in Switzerland. The WEF is famous for its annual meeting in Davos, where important people discuss world issues. They also do reports, projects, and regional conferences.

The organization has some criticism, like not being transparent enough and having too much power over global decisions. Some people also question the environmental impact of their meetings.
title: World Economic Forum
